text:
1. I wouldn't do that, if I were in your Shoes.
2. I wouldn't listen to him if I were you.
3. what would you do if you were the
President of our country?
4. If more People use Public transport, there would be less pollution.
5. If I knew the answer, I would tell you!
6. If I had to move to another country, I'd refuse.
7. If you forgot a maths test, what would you do?
8. If I went to Russia, I would visit the red square.
9. If you were rich, what car would you have?
10. I would do more exercise if l were you.
trans:
1. Je ne ferais pas ça, si j'étais à ta Place.
2. Je ne l'écouterais pas si j'étais toi.
3. Que ferais-tu si tu étais le
Président de notre pays ?
4. Si plus de Gens prenaient les transports Publics, il y aurait moins de pollution.
5. Si je connaissais la réponse, je te la dirais !
6. Si je devais déménager dans un autre pays, je refuserais.
7. Si tu oubliais un test de mathématiques, que ferais-tu ?
8. Si j'allais en Russie, je visiterais la place rouge.
9. Si tu étais riche, quelle voiture aurais-tu ?
10. Je ferais plus d'exercice si j'étais toi.
